verses.verse: Then Joseph <WH3130> could <WH3201> not refrain <WH662> himself before all <WH3605> them that stood <WH5324> by him; and he cried, <WH7121> Cause every <WH3605> man <WH376> to go <WH3318> out from me. And there stood <WH5975> no <WH3808> man <WH376> with him, while Joseph <WH3130> made himself known <WH3045> to his brothers. <WH251>
And he wept <WH5414>( <WH853>) <WH6963> <WH1065> aloud: <WH6963> and the Egyptians <WH4714> and the house <WH1004> of Pharaoh <WH6547> heard. <WH8085>

And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> I am Joseph; <WH3130> does my father <WH1> yet <WH5750> live? <WH2416> And his brothers <WH251> could <WH3201> not answer <WH6030> him; for they were troubled <WH926> at his presence. <WH6440>

And Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his brothers, <WH251> Come <WH5066> near <WH5066> to me, I pray <WH4994> you. And they came <WH5066> near. <WH5066> And he said, <WH559> I am Joseph <WH3130> your brother, <WH251> whom <WH834> you sold <WH4376> into Egypt. <WH4714>

Now <WH6258> therefore be not grieved, <WH6087> nor <WH408> angry <WH2734> with yourselves, <WH5869> that you sold <WH4376> me here: for God <WH430> did send <WH7971> me before <WH6440> you to preserve <WH4241> life.

For these <WH2088> two years <WH8141> has the famine <WH7458> been in the land: <WH776> and yet <WH5750> there are five <WH2568> years, <WH8141> in the which <WH834> there shall neither <WH369> be ripening <WH2758> nor harvest. <WH7105>

And God <WH430> sent <WH7971> me before <WH6440> you to preserve <WH7760> you a posterity <WH7611> in the earth, <WH776> and to save <WH2421> your lives <WH2421> by a great <WH1419> deliverance. <WH6413>

So now <WH6258> it was not you that sent <WH7971> me here, but God: <WH430> and he has made <WH7760> me a father <WH1> to Pharaoh, <WH6547> and lord <WH113> of all <WH3605> his house, <WH1004> and a ruler <WH4910> throughout all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

Haste <WH4116> you, and go <WH5927> up to my father, <WH1> and say <WH559> to him, Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> your son <WH1121> Joseph, <WH3130> God <WH430> has made <WH7760> me lord <WH113> of all <WH3605> Egypt: <WH4714> come <WH3381> down <WH3381> to me, tarry <WH5975> not:

And you shall dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Goshen, <WH1657> and you shall be near <WH7138> to me, you, and your children, <WH1121> and your children's <WH1121> children, <WH1121> and your flocks, <WH6629> and your herds, <WH1241> and all <WH3605> that you have:

And there <WH8033> will I nourish <WH3557> you; for yet <WH5750> there are five <WH2568> years <WH8141> of famine; <WH7458> lest <WH6435> you, and your household, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that you have, come to poverty. <WH3423>
And, behold, <WH2009> your eyes <WH5869> see, <WH7200> and the eyes <WH5869> of my brother <WH251> Benjamin, <WH1144> that it is my mouth <WH6310> that speaks <WH1696> to you.

And you shall tell <WH5046> my father <WH1> of all <WH3605> my glory <WH3519> in Egypt, <WH4714> and of all <WH3605> that you have seen; <WH7200> and you shall haste <WH4116> and bring <WH3381> down <WH3381> my father here.
And he fell <WH5307> on his brother <WH251> Benjamin's <WH1144> neck, <WH6677> and wept; <WH1058> and Benjamin <WH1144> wept <WH1058> on his neck. <WH6677>
Moreover he kissed <WH5401> all <WH3605> his brothers, <WH251> and wept <WH1058> on them: and after <WH310> that his brothers <WH251> talked <WH1696> with him.

And the fame <WH6963> thereof was heard <WH8085> in Pharaoh's <WH6547> house, <WH1004> saying, <WH559> Joseph's <WH3130> brothers <WH251> are come: <WH935> and it pleased <WH3190> <WH5869> Pharaoh <WH6547> well, and his servants. <WH5650>

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> Say <WH559> to your brothers, <WH251> This <WH2063> do <WH6213> you; lade <WH2943> your beasts, <WH1165> and go, <WH3212> get <WH935> you to the land <WH776> of Canaan; <WH3667>

And take <WH3947> your father <WH1> and your households, <WH1004> and come <WH935> to me: and I will give <WH5414> you the good <WH2898> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and you shall eat <WH398> the fat <WH2459> of the land. <WH776>

Now you are commanded, <WH6680> this <WH2063> do <WH6213> you; take <WH3947> you wagons <WH5699> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> for your little <WH2945> ones, and for your wives, <WH802> and bring <WH5375> your father, <WH1> and come. <WH935>
Also regard <WH5869> not your stuff; <WH3627> for the good <WH2898> of all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> is your's.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> so: <WH3651> and Joseph <WH3130> gave <WH5414> them wagons, <WH5699> according <WH5921> to the commandment <WH6310> of Pharaoh, <WH6547> and gave <WH5414> them provision <WH6720> for the way. <WH1870>

To all <WH3605> of them he gave <WH5414> each man <WH376> changes <WH2487> of raiment; <WH8071> but to Benjamin <WH1144> he gave <WH5414> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> pieces of silver, <WH3701> and five <WH2568> changes <WH2487> of raiment. <WH8071>

And to his father <WH1> he sent <WH7971> after this <WH2063> manner; ten <WH6235> asses <WH2543> laden <WH5375> with the good <WH2898> things of Egypt, <WH4714> and ten <WH6235> she asses <WH860> laden <WH5375> with corn <WH1250> and bread <WH3899> and meat <WH4202> for his father <WH1> by the way. <WH1870>
So he sent <WH7971> his brothers <WH251> away, and they departed: <WH3212> and he said <WH559> to them, See that you fall <WH7264> not out by the way. <WH1870>
And they went <WH5927> up out of Egypt, <WH4714> and came <WH935> into the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> to Jacob <WH3290> their father, <WH1>

And told <WH5046> him, saying, <WH559> Joseph <WH3130> is yet <WH5750> alive, <WH2416> and he is governor <WH4910> over all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714> And Jacob's heart <WH3820> fainted, <WH6313> for he believed <WH539> them not.

And they told <WH1696> him all <WH3605> the words <WH1697> of Joseph, <WH3130> which <WH834> he had said <WH1697> to them: and when he saw <WH7200> the wagons <WH5699> which <WH834> Joseph <WH3130> had sent <WH7971> to carry <WH5375> him, the spirit <WH7307> of Jacob <WH3290> their father <WH1> revived: <WH2421>
And Israel <WH3478> said, <WH559> It is enough; <WH7227> Joseph <WH3130> my son <WH1121> is yet <WH5750> alive: <WH2416> I will go <WH3212> and see <WH7200> him before <WH2962> I die. <WH4191>
